item.title: Tech-content recomendation
item.description: These days popular content on YouTube is garbage, and I mean it. You don’t agree with me? Maybe you haven’t seen the main YouTube page in a while without cookies. Just open a youtube.com tab in an incognito window and you will see the abomination I’m referring to. It’s just full of hyper-saturated thumbnails with people showing their mouths fully open just for the sake of more views. I know, terrible stuff.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi and welcome to my humble website! My name is Asier Jiménez. I’m a 20-year-old IT student amazed by topics such as Open Source, Linux, Homebrew, Hardware Offloading, GP-GPU, exotic CPU architectures, and more! I’m currently studying an Advanced Systems Administration degree while I study for the Cambridge B2 English certificate. I also plan on getting the AWS Certified SysOps Administrator certificate in addition to the LPIC-2 in the future.
